You enjoy going to the river docks alone to watch the boats. Sitting under a tree, you watch as the different kinds of ships and steamers load or unload in Chegckle. Most of the people seem to sleep inside their boats. You find these otherwordly ships fascinating.

One day a strange looking steamer docks at the river. It is longer that most ships and is built from sleek shiny metal. It has lots of flashy lights and looks extremely fancy. It seems to be steam powered but the ship seems powerful and strong. From the size, you guess that it has a small below deck room too, aside from its top cabin. You wonder where this boat could be from.
